page.content:
“The Kick” is a podcast for movie lovers who can’t have just one. We’re the sort who finish a movie and immediately want to see everything else the director has made or check out the three movies that influenced this one.

Part of the Now Playing Network, “The Kick” runs in multi-episode arcs—“kicks” if you will—that explore a particular sub-genre or filmography, and then culminate in a relevant new release. As in, “I’m on a Julia Roberts rom-com kick, and it won’t be over until I see her new movie.”

Every week, Chance will be joined by a fellow writer, filmmaker, or movie appreciator. You can contact him at chancesolempfeifer@gmail.com and read his film writings in the Willamette Week.
page.title: About “The Kick”
